opening_theme: "Mahoutsukai Sally no Uta (魔法使いサリーのうた)" by Three Graces
ending_theme: #1: "Mahou no Mambo (魔法のマンボ)" by Yoko Maekawa (eps 1-26)
#2: "Itazura no Uta (いたずらのうた)" by Yukari Asai, Masako Nozawa, Midori Kato and Michiko Hirai (eps 27-73)
#3: "Papapa no Choina no Uta (パパパのチョイナのうた)" by Yoko Mizugaki (eps 74-109)
